duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide individual, family, and group counseling and therapeutic interventions within the program.
Engage families in planning for service and ensuring access to community resources.
Advocate with external resources for the residents and provide access to concrete services and community resources.
Liaise between program, family court, ACS, case planners, youth’s family members, and relevant community members.
Meet with assigned residents for weekly sessions and attend conferences, court hearings, and planned ACS and school conferences.

education_certification.credential: License Masters in Social Work (LMSW), with a minimum of one year of relevant experience with similar population. Or LCSW certification required. Valid Driver’s License required.
